name: This Is Fine
description: The memecoin 'FINE' it refer to meme 'This Is Fine'. 'FINE' developed on the TON  blockchain, is a unique fun token with an interesting feature: it can 'ðŸ”¥BURN!ðŸ”¥' The idea of the meme coin is inspired by the popular internet meme that depicts a dog in a room engulfed in flames, reassuring that 'everything is fine'. This coin not only reflects the cultural peculiarity of the modern internet space but also introduces an innovative mechanism into the cryptocurrency ecosystem, adding elements of gameplay and self-regulation.
